ca.ualberta.cs.models

Class Observable<T extends Observer>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.models.Observable<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - This is the data type of the view
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AuthorModel, ForumEntryList

    public abstract class Observable<T extends Observer>
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains a list of all the views who are "observing" this model. All classes which are added here must implement the Observer interface. The code for this class is based heavily on Abram Hindle's "MVC and Android" slides.
    Author:
    bbruner
